P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.GameRunner
This GameRunner Class extends JPanel, which is used for the screens, and implements KeyListener, an important facet for the whole game.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.MainMenu
This method paints the rectangular buttons that were drawn in the previous method; the Graphics g is passed down.
PhysicsObject - Class in pyramid.plunder
This class creates guidelines for the physics behind movement in the game.
PhysicsObject(int[]) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.PhysicsObject
This method creates the an object in the game that is effected by gravity.
PhysicsObject(int[], boolean) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.PhysicsObject
This method creates turns gravity on for an object in the game.
Platform - Class in pyramid.plunder
This Platform Class extends the PhysicsObject Class; this class passes down the image and creates the platform in the game.
Platform(int[]) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Platform
This Platform method is passed the int images; the super is given images and false, the name is assigned to "Platform."
playBackgrounds() - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.Music
In this playBackgrounds method, the sound file located and named as, src/JustinPPSong.wav, is implemented in a try-catch loop and played.
Player - Class in pyramid.plunder
This Sword class extends PhysicsObject class; the various characteristics of the player are implemented, the player is drawn here through the Draw method and Graphics g, other important characteristics are also developed.
Player(int[]) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Player
This Player class extends Weapons class; the various characteristics of the sword are implemented, the sword is drawn here through the Draw method and Graphics g.
Player(int[], int, int) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Player
 
playerData(String) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.SaveLoad
In this boolean playerData the String fileName is passed; the user's data is saved onto a .dat file, which the user can access.
playSound(String, float) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.Music
In this playSound method, String name and float volume is passed down; a try-catch statement is defined and the logerror is defined.
priceWeapon(Weapon) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.Weapon
This int priceWeapon method is passed down Weapon w; various mathematical computations are made through the float and pow; when the numbers correctly match the weapon, the specific weapon is selected.
pyramid.plunder - package pyramid.plunder
 
PyramidPlunder - Class in pyramid.plunder
This main menu class presents the main credits page, and calls the loghandling class it also plays this- "src/TLPTheme Song.wav" - during the beginning.
PyramidPlunder() - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.PyramidPlunder
